fields.description:
h4.Feature Request
Add the ability to automate testing throughout following tools:

- Monkey Talk (http://www.gorillalogic.com/)
- Robotium (http://code.google.com/p/robotium/)
fields.summary: Android: Enable automating testing throughout tools

comments.body: [~egomez] It seems possible to do so, or they could export their project to XCode and just manually add the MoneyTalk lib. I think a little experimentation would be required.
